```{r setup, cachedChunk, cache = TRUE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(forcats)
library(plotly)
library(janitor)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)

ny_noaa = read_csv("../data/nynoaadat.zip") %>%
  clean_names %>%
  separate(date, into = c("year", "month","day"), sep = "-") %>%
  filter(year >= 2000) %>%
  select(everything())


```

### Figure 1: General Trend of Precipitation

```{r, cachedChunk, cache = TRUE}
figure_1 = ny_noaa %>%
  select("year", "prcp") %>%
  na.omit() %>%
  filter(year >= 2000) %>%
  mutate(year = as.factor(year)) %>%
 plot_ly(y = ~prcp, color = ~year, type = "box", colors = "Set2") %>%
    layout(title = "Yearly Precipitation Trends over time")

```

  na.omit() %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
summarize(mean_tmin = mean(tmin),  
          mean_tmax = mean(tmax))
  plot_ly( mean_tmin , mean_tmax , type = "scatter", mode = "points", color = year)
